debug.experimental_patches.disabled: Noxesium UI performance patches are now off
debug.experimental_patches.enabled: Noxesium UI performance patches are now on
debug.experimental_patches.help: F3 + W = Toggle Noxesium UI performance patches
debug.noxesium_settings.help: F3 + V = Open Noxesium settings menu
debug.fps_overlay.enabled: FPS counter is now on (turn off with F3 + Y)
debug.fps_overlay.help: F3 + Y = Toggle on-screen fps counter
noxesium.options.game_time_overlay.name: Game Time Overlay
noxesium.options.game_time_overlay.toolt:
Adds a small overlay that shows the current game time.

§cIntended for shader development.
noxesium.options.fps_overlay.name: FPS Overlay
noxesium.options.fps_overlay.tooltip: Adds a small overlay that shows the current fps in the top left corner of your screen.
noxesium.options.reset_toggle_keys.name: Reset Toggle Keys on Death
noxesium.options.reset_toggle_keys.toolt: Whether to reset toggled keys (sprint/sneak) when you respawn. Normally enabled in vanilla.
noxesium.options.render_maps_as_ui.name: Render Maps in UI
noxesium.options.render_maps_as_ui.toolt:
If enabled, maps held in one hand are rendered in the top left/right corner of your screen instead of relative to your hand location.

If set to "Ask server" the server you are playing on is able to enable or disable this feature.
noxesium.options.ui_map_size.name: Map UI Size
noxesium.options.ui_map_size.tooltip: Controls the size of the map for the "Render Maps in UI" setting.
noxesium.options.ui_map_location.name: Map UI Location
noxesium.options.ui_map_location.tooltip: Controls the location of the map for the "Render Maps in UI" setting.
noxesium.options.dump_incoming_packets.t:
Enables logging of Noxesium packets that are handled by the client.

§cIntended for server developers working on Noxesium integrations.
noxesium.options.dump_outgoing_packets.t:
Enables logging of Noxesium packets sent to the server.

§cIntended for server developers working on Noxesium integrations.
noxesium.options.qib_debug_visuals.name: Debug Qib System
noxesium.options.qib_debug_visuals.toolt:
Enables debug visuals for the qib system.

§cIntended for server developers working on Noxesium integrations.
noxesium.options.extended_packet_logging:
Adds additional error logs to various types of invalid packet exceptions.

§cIntended for server developers.
noxesium.options.enable_glowing_keybinds:
Adds additional keybinds which make players glow based on their team color. Requires restarting game to apply!

§cKeybinds only work while spectating.
noxesium.options.experimental_patches.to:
§fEnables experimental optimizations that dynamically adjust the framerate at which UI elements are rendered.

§cWarning: If you experience any UI rendering issues while using this setting, please report issues to Noxesium, not the other mods involved.
noxesium.options.min_ui_framerate.name: Min UI Framerate
noxesium.options.min_ui_framerate.toolti:
Sets the lowest framerate at which UI elements are rendered. This controls how quickly the UI will adapt to controls.

§eRecommended Value: §f30 fps
noxesium.options.max_ui_framerate.name: Max UI Framerate
noxesium.options.max_ui_framerate.toolti:
Sets the highest framerate at which UI elements are rendered.

§cSetting this to Unlimited has a very high performance impact!

§eRecommended Value: §f60 fps
noxesium.options.optimization_overlay.to: Adds a small overlay that shows debug information about the UI rendering optimizations.
